multiple-choice.question: What was the speaker's lifelong goal as a geologist and underwater mapper?

multiple-choice.question: How many times do you breathe in per day?

options.label: B
options.text: To carry carbon dioxide from the body's tissues to the lungs

options.label: C
options.text: To regulate the production of red blood cells

options.label: B
options.text: To produce hemoglobin, which decreases red blood cell production

options.label: C

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.text: Their happiness increased no more than that of a control group who hadn't won the lottery.

options.text: Their happiness decreased immediately after winning.

options.text: The study found no correlation between winning the lottery and happiness.

options.label: C

options.text: The happiness levels of those who spent it on themselves were significantly greater.

options.label: B
options.text: The happiness levels of those who spent it on others were significantly greater.

options.label: C
options.text: There was no difference in happiness levels between the two groups.

options.label: D
options.text: The study found no correlation between spending money and happiness.

options.label: B

options.label: D
options.text: The study found no correlation between wealth and behavior.
